gems.name: rtfm-filemanager
gems.info: A full featured terminal browser with syntax highlighted files, images shown in the terminal, videos thumbnailed, etc. You can bookmark and jump around easily, delete, rename, copy, symlink and move files. RTFM has a a wide range of other features. New in 3.14: Better error handling. 3.14.1: Fixed bug in launching rtfm without the launcher 'r'. 3.17: Fixed an insideous bug by flushing STDIN.
